products.name: DOSTBIN OFFICIAL PRODUCT INFORMATION (LATEST - USE THIS FOR ALL QUERIES)
products.description:
IMPORTANT: This is the official and most up-to-date product information. Use this for all pricing, variants, delivery, and capacity queries.

=== DOSTBIN VARIANTS AND PRICING (LATEST) ===

1. DOSTBIN BASIC - ₹19,999 (inclusive of GST)
   - Manual compost machine
   - Capacity: Up to 5 Kg/day
   - Simple, eco-friendly composting
   - Manual operation

2. DOSTBIN POPULAR - ₹24,999 (inclusive of GST)
   - Semi-automatic compost machine
   - Capacity: Up to 5 Kg/day
   - Comes with manual operations with a dual handle
   - Great for hassle-free composting

3. DOSTBIN PREMIUM - ₹34,999 (inclusive of GST)
   - Fully automatic compost machine
   - Capacity: Up to 5 Kg/day
   - Comes with advance feature like automatic control with electronic and motorized operations
   - Shred and digest buttons for easy operation

=== DELIVERY INFORMATION ===
- Delivery Time: 20-25 business days across PAN India
- Free delivery included in price

=== WASTE CAPACITY ===
- All variants (Basic, Popular, Premium): Up to 5 Kg/day

=== WHAT CAN BE COMPOSTED ===
CAN be composted: Vegetable and fruit peels, garden waste, coffee/tea grounds, leftover food, dal/sambar (remove liquid content), eggshells, paper products
CANNOT be composted: Dairy, fatty oil/gravy, meat, bones, hard items like mango seed and coconut shell, plastic, metals

For more information on composting, watch these videos:
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7jsXoghslQ (Composting basics)
- https://www.youtube.com/shorts/yJSMnd9g2yo (Quick guide)
products.raw_text: DOSTBIN OFFICIAL PRODUCT INFORMATION - LATEST PRICING AND DETAILS

DOSTBIN POPULAR: ₹24,999 (inclusive of GST), semi-automatic with manual operations with a dual handle, up to 5 Kg/day capacity. DOSTBIN PREMIUM: ₹34,999 (inclusive of GST), fully automatic with advance feature like automatic control with electronic and motorized operations, up to 5 Kg/day capacity. DELIVERY: 20-25 business days across PAN India, free delivery included. COMPOSTING INFO: Watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7jsXoghslQ and https://www.youtube.com/shorts/yJSMnd9g2yo for guides.

faqs.question: uip every Dostbin unit with its well thought intern
faqs.answer: l design and advanced features such as IoT connectivity, sensor-based operation. Modular design for ease of use and optimal performance is the key. At Dostbin, we are committed to providing not only cutting-edge composting technology but also comprehensive support and services to our customers. From installation and setup to ongoing composting cycles, our team of experts ensures that every Dostbin user receives the assistance they need to maximise their composting experience. You are invited to share your knowledge and experience through our blogs page. We keep our composting community updated with relevant topics through our social media pages. OUR VISION Making every household free from wet waste collection issues and help them contribute to greener, cleaner environment by converting their kitchen waste to compost and nourish soil for chemical free food for us. OUR MISSION - To offer efficient, user-friendly composting solutions in manual and automatic variants, ensuring hassle-free home composting. - To be available to our customers with timely service and support in converting their wet waste to wealth for us. WHERE IT ALL STARTED CARBON FOOTPRINT Organic waste, such as food scraps and yard trimmings, is sent to landfills, It undergoes the anaerobic process of decomposition, which produces methane. It is a potent greenhouse gas. The leachate produced seeps in and contaminate underground water. Hence by composting, we can considerably reduce air, water and land pollution. Methane has a much higher global warming potential than carbon dioxide. So, diverting organic waste from landfills helps mitigate climate change and make Earth greener and cleaner for coming generations. Its an urgent requirement from urban households to reduce our carbon footprint and contribute to reduce the big gap in attainment of SDG 11 with sustainable cities and communities. The red flag for India can be seen here. RESPONSIBLE CITIZEN Practice of three Rs of waste management. First, the “Reduction” of consumption by buying only what we need. Second, “Reuse” of items whenever it is possible. Third, “Recycling” materials that Dostbin processes into new products. This helps conserve resources, minimize waste, reduce the energy and emissions associated with production and disposal. We can contribute by handing over segregated dry waste to responsible hands for recycling. However, wet waste can be recycled to compost at source by adopting Dostbin and handing over compost to us to supply to farmers. This also reduces air pollution by vehicles which transport our wet waste to landfills daily. Government also urges citizens for the same and soon it may become a mandate. BECOMING AN ETHICAL BRAND We're Proud of WHAT WE'RE DOING Our motive is to make every household comfortable handling their wet waste by effortless composting through our innovative product, support and services. We look forward to greener, cleaner environment for future generations and healthier, chemical free food for us. We wish to engage in supplying excess compost from all households to farmers and enrich our soil with nutrients which is lost in landfills. The vision of Dostbin is to establish a society where wet waste is viewed as a valuable resource rather than a burden. Each one of us can contribute to complete mother nature’s cycle of sending back the nutrients to mother earth for further production of healthy food for us.

faqs.question: uired) process th
faqs.answer: t converts organic materials (kitchen waste) into a nutrient-rich, biologically-stable soil amendment through natural decomposition. Composting helps to reduce waste around us, reduces methane emissions and hence global warming. It improves soil health thus reducing synthetic fertilizer use which results in better chemical free food for us. It promotes higher crop yields for farmers. Compost enhances water retention in soils thus healthier plant growth. It conserves water and helps in better ground water retention. Several compost bin for manual composting is available in market. Home composting use to be labor, space and time intensive until Dostbin was invented. With a focus on innovation and technology and customer centric support and service, we bring a device to your household for hassle free composting with smart compost bin. Let’s create a world where every house does ‘redefined composting’ and contributes to a healthier planet. DOSTBIN FEATURES First In INDIA IOT Interface < 5 Units/Month Electronic Control Based Motorized Operation Mobile App Based Control Buy Back/Contribute to Organic Compost Supply Chain

faqs.question: uid fertilizer c
faqs.answer: n be collected through leachate channels to nourish your potted plants/garden. - A separate accessory provided to drain liquid discharge, if not needed. - Manual handle is provided for aeration for faster composting. Aerating once per day for 2 minutes helps in efficient operation. DOSTBIN POPULAR Rs. 24,999/- * - DOSTBin popular gives granulated compost powder and comes with two handles. - Your daily input doesn’t mix with the earlier batch for efficient operation. - High nutrient liquid fertilizer can be collected through leachate channels to nourish your potted plants/garden. - A separate accessory provided to drain liquid discharge, if not needed. - Manual handle is provided for aeration for faster composting. Aerating once per day for 2 minutes helps in efficient operation. - Its manual handheld shredder helps to shred the kitchen waste with high-grade stainless-steel blades which composts faster. DOSTBIN PREMIUM Rs. 34,999/- * - DOSTBin Premium’s electronic control unit with FEED, DIGEST and RESET touch buttons makes composting effortless for its users. - FEED’s shred and DIGEST’s aeration operation is managed by robust motors. - DIGEST operation is automated to run every six hours in auto mode to enhance quality of output compost. - DOSTBin Premium uses less than 5 units of electricity per month. - Get extended services from us through the mobile application - Embrace a circular economy and contribute to a greener environment by opting for DOSTBin’s compost buy-back option. NOTE : * Prices are inclusive of taxes (5% GST) and Free Delivery PAN India FEATURES What Makes it Hassle Free Two Stage Composting with aeration channels Shredder reduces waste size for faster composting Channel for collecting liquid fertiliser from each stage Aeration Mixer rotor (No Worms / Smell) Electronic Controlled Motorized Operation (DOSTBin Premium) Easy Collection of Compost TESTIMONIALS FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQs) 1 What are all the Wastes can be added in DOSTBin? Vegetable and fruit peels, garden waste, Coffee / Tea Grounds, Leftover Food, Dal/Sambar (Remove the Liquid Content) Not Allowed : Dairy, fatty oil/gravy, meat, bones, hard items like mango seed and coconut shell. 2 How much compost will be produced from the Device? It depends on the input. 2 kg/day input yields over 6 kg compost every 10 days. Compost output is 30% of input. One liter of output leachate becomes 16 liters of nutrient-rich liquid fertilizer when diluted 1:15 with water. 3 If I don’t want to use Liquid Fertilizer (Leachate), what can be done? If you don’t want to use the fertilizer for your plants, you can connect the outlet to your drainage with the accessory pipe provided with your DOSTBin. MOBILE FRIENDLY CONTROL FOR DOSTBIN DOSTBin Premium Demo Video DOSTBin Popular Demo Video Turn kitchen waste into compost and liquid fertiliser with DOSTBin Popular — a simple manual solution for a cleaner, greener environment.

faqs.answer: nual, Popular, and Automatic, are made so that waste management as a practice is both effortless and environment friendly at the same time. Deliveries are made in limited cities like Pune, Kerala, and Bangalore through a reasonable pre-order price. Secondly, once you are ready to place your order you are expected to pay ₹5000 only as a small booking amount of the order and the rest is payable on completion of the order. One’s Dostbin shall be delivered within 20-25 business days from the date of placing the order or from the date of payment, this is in line with your desire to lead an eco-friendly life. Why Individual Leaders Should Choose Composting? As an individual leader, you are in a position to change how people perceive and act concerning sustainability. On the personal level or within the organization where one works, when composting is done, one: Be a role model: Do not forget about managerial waste, do it the right way and place easily degrading organic matter into separate waste banks. Minimize carbon footprints: By diverting waste from disposal facilities through composting, there will be less waste dumped, and less greenhouse gases produced, therefore, cleaner environments. Advantages of Composting for Individual Leaders Nobody leaves an opportunity to be a leader behind, especially by going for Dostbin. They can enjoy the following: Effective waste management: Transform the daily kitchen waste into compost which can be used for gardens, housed professionally, or donated to community projects. Contributes to sustainability: Don’t just support causes but become the one who starts them to change the world for the better. Gives a level of education: Help in disseminating information on the benefits of composting and sustainability by engaging other people in the composting process. Savings: The process of composting decreases the costs of waste disposal and also contributes to making organic fertilizers that help improve soil quality. Dostbin’s Commitment to Individual Leaders At Dostbin, we recognize that local leaders play a pivotal role in bringing about change in their communities. Our composting solutions give you the chance to have a long-lasting effect, whether you’re in charge of an NGO, spearheading a corporate sustainability effort, or just trying to reduce your carbon footprint. We are dedicated to helping you on your journey toward sustainability by providing solutions that are: Eco-friendly: Designed to minimize environmental impact. Custom made: With a great focus on offering various automation and control levels. Easy to use: By more options for composting manually, semi-automatic, or automatic. As a thank you for your commitment and influence, we provide individual leaders with financial benefits, special awards or diplomas, and recognition on our website. We’ll appreciate anything that you do, so grow with us and receive recognition for your achievements! Delivery and Payment Options To avoid any hassle on your part, we have made it simple for you by providing delivery options to Pune, Kerala, and Bangalore. For just ₹5000, make your pre-order and secure your Dostbin without any of that ‘no more reserving’ nonsense – only the balance is payable on delivery. The composting bin will be delivered within 20-25 business days from the date of order for which we give you ample time to arrange your waste in advance. Lead the Change with Dostbin Put your sustainability mandate to good use with this composting system offered by Dostbin. Be it in your home, your office, or in the community, starting now with a pre-order will allow you to convert food and other organic wastes into quality compost. Today, please get in touch with us to find out how you can change the world with Dostbin.

faqs.answer: ce waste management which suits the modern environmental trends. Apartment residents may easily transform organic waste into beneficial compost with Dostbin’s three variants—Manual, Popular, and Automatic—contributing to a cleaner and greener environment. For pre-orders, we require an initial payment of ₹5000, with the remaining amount due at the time of delivery to expedite the process. Within 20-25 business days after the order date, your Dostbin will be delivered, enabling apartment buildings to prepare for a sustainable future. Composting In Apartment Association – Where It Is And Why It Is Important Waste management at the community level is well coordinated by the apartment associations. Waste segregation and collection are challenges that the cities are facing due to several households producing organic waste every day. This is where a composting solution comes in and all the benefits included are: Waste Reduction: Waste Management Authorities report that apartments and Socratic associations remove a considerable amount of waste sent to landfills, by kitchen scraps and dry leaves into compost. Cost Savings: Self-sufficient in producing such compost, apartments cut down on the waste that would have been payable for hire and also the usage of fertilizers for gardens. Environmental Responsibilities: Composting helps create a cleaner, more sustainable environment by lowering a community’s carbon footprint. Why Apartment Associations Should Choose Dostbin? Dostbin offers an excellent solution to apartment buildings’ problems when managing organic garbage. Using technologies that are customized for different community sizes, associations can: Streamline Waste Management: Introducing waste recycling constitutes an easing of the waste management that includes collection and disposal hence improving the trend both for the residents and the management of the apartment complexes. Enhance Community Engagement: These may be community-initiated and participated projects whereby the residents help to sort out and even make the compost themselves improving a sense of accountability and collaboration. Improve Green Spaces: Application of the produced compost to the other non-fruit-bearing plants will aid in beautification as well as environmental Improvement of the apartment complex. Our Commitment to Apartment Communities At Dostbin, we understand the difficulties that Apartment Associations have regarding waste management, and therefore we appreciate your help. Our composting solutions are built to be user-friendly, effective, and ecology-conscious too. Whether your community is at the initial steps of waste management or wants to enhance the current system, you will find an appropriate solution with us. With a ₹5000 down payment, you may secure your Dostbin through our pre-order process, which guarantees delivery to Pune, Kerala, and Bangalore at this time. Delivery, which is promised to occur within 20-25 business days of the purchase date, is when full payment is due. Additionally, our staff is available to assist your community with the setup and upkeep of the composting bins. Enhance the Composting Technology in Your Community Thanks to Dostbin The adoption of the Dostbin composting bins will have a positive effect on the community. We have got you covered with our manual, semi-automatic, and automatic composting bins. Place your pre-order now and get ready for a better, cleaner tomorrow.

faqs.question: uest by You to purch
faqs.answer: se Goods from Us. Service refers to the Website. Website refers to Dostbin, accessible from https://dostbin.com You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Shipping Policy Once order is placed the minimum shipping time is 12 days and maximum shipping time is 20 days. Your Order Cancellation Rights You are entitled to cancel Your Order within 14 days without giving any reason for doing so. The deadline for cancelling an Order is 14 days from the date on which You received the Goods or on which a third party you have appointed, who is not the carrier, takes possession of the product delivered. In order to exercise Your right of cancellation, You must inform Us of your decision by means of a clear statement. You can inform us of your decision by: - By email: info@dostbin.com We will reimburse You no later than 14 days from the day on which We receive the returned Goods. We will use the same means of payment as You used for the Order, and You will not incur any fees for such reimbursement. Conditions for Returns Our Executive will be visiting the house where purchase is made and check for conditions. If no damage has occurred in the product and return will be processed after executive has picked up the product/ machine. Once it reaches the production unit or office/ source within 10 days from that the returns can be processed. This type of return is done when the machine is purchased but not working. In order for the Goods to be eligible for a return, please make sure that: - The Goods were purchased in the last 14 days - The Goods are in the original packaging The following Goods cannot be returned: Product cannot be returned if it is in right condition as approved by Dostbin Company but physically damaged post purchase. - All returns/ cancellations options are for Dostbin device and not for other accessory products like charcoal / cocopeat/ remix powder. We reserve the right to refuse returns of any merchandise that does not meet the above return conditions in our sole discretion. Only regular priced Goods may be refunded. Unfortunately, Goods on sale cannot be refunded. This exclusion may not apply to You if it is not permitted by applicable law. Time Duration Please note that number of days taken to process the refund and credit the refund amount to customer’s bank account is 14 working days. Servicing With respect to servicing we want to provide regularly once in 6 months or once in a 1 year. If customer has taken frequent servicing facility from us for the product we can assure you that the machine will work in the best condition. Replacement: If damage is in body of machine or in electrical electronics part of machine we can give warranty of replacement with new machine. We also offer to replace just the non working parts with new ones and in some special cases w.r.t getting validation by our expert we will confirm return but we are proud of our exchange policy itself and highly recommend. Worst case if return is confirmed within 10 days of purchase it should be returned Gifts If the Goods were marked as a gift when purchased and then shipped directly to you, You’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned product is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to You. If the Goods weren’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the Order shipped to themselves to give it to You later, We will send the refund to the gift giver. Contact Us If you have any questions about our Returns and Refunds Policy, please contact us: - By email: info@dostbin.com - Phone: +919740374780 - Operating Address: Dostbin Solutions Private Limited Room no 7, BMS innovation Centre and Entrepreneurship Park (BICEP), 2nd floor, Lab block, BMS institute of Technology and Management, Avalahalli, Doddaballapur road, Yelahanka, Bengaluru 560064, Karnataka, India.

The home composters that we offer are aimed at beginners who do not have previous experience in composting or tendering the process themself at all. Our selection of the best composting bins for homes comes in various designs to accommodate homes. You can compost with ease because of these bins’ ease of use, durability, and lack of odor. Home Composters: Efficient and User-Friendly Composting bins for flats are also available in Dostbin as various forms of home composter are available there for household wet waste management. Our composters work towards the creation of ideal conditions for aerobic composting defeating bad odors and promoting added airflow. These Automatic composting bins for home are also easy to use and survive any home and garden setup whether indoors or outside. Our products stand out from the competition for families searching for the best composting bins for homes due to their premium materials and cutting-edge functionality. These bins quicken the decomposition process and all your kitchen scraps become compost in just a few days. Weeks. Kitchen refuse, scrapes, garden clippings, and many others are taken by our home composters without breaking a sweat. Waste Composting Machines for Every Household For those who lack the time to pile up their kitchen waste and prefer a more mechanical way to do it, we can also provide waste composting machines. Such machines are useful to those households that produce excess organic waste and need a better cost-effective process of composting. Our waste composting machines will do all the work of compacting the organic waste and composting it within a short time to give you quality compost. It is good that these machines are simple to use and can work with home composting bins for a more comprehensive waste solution. No matter whether you’ve just started adopting this environmentally friendly practice or are seeking to upgrade your existing system, the best composting bins for home and waste composting machines will guarantee that the waste from your household will be disposed of in a more eco-friendly manner. Are you prepared to transform your house into an environmentally friendly one? faqs.answer: te the composting cycle. What is Remix Powder? Remix powder is a specifically blended mixture that’s meant to initiate and quicken the composting process. It has the appropriate ratio of carbon to nitrogen, which facilitates the fast and effective breakdown of organic materials in the right conditions. Compost powder makes sure that food scraps, yard trash, and other biodegradable materials turn into rich, nutrient-dense compost faster when put in your composting bin. It’s a necessary tool for anyone trying to increase the efficiency of their home composting. Benefits of Compost Maker Powder for Composting Remix powder composting is an easy solution that allows increasing the speed and quality of the composting process. The powder ensures that appropriate parasite amounts that enhance the breakdown of the organic materials are present, thus converting the trash to compost in a shorter time. It also provides an advantage by combating smell and keeping the compost bin fresh at all times. All in all, whether you are new to composting or an expert composter, compost maker powder will help to make and enhance the composting processes and therefore you will get the quality of compost with little input. How to Use Remix Powder for Composting Bins To maintain the health and balance of your compost, empty the remix powder pack before starting the composting process for the best results. Periodically, you may add more compost maker powder, every quarter. In addition to preventing offensive odors, this will assist in maintaining the proper ratio of nutrients required for conversion. Anyone who uses automated or manual composting bins at home will find it to be the ideal partner. Compost maker powder facilitates easier and more efficient composting; it is now available in Bangalore, Pune, and Kerala, to spread PAN India soon. faqs.answer: net. This blog will give insight into the comparative scrutiny of traditional versus composting waste disposal, stressing the significance of the economic, environmental, and social effects of every method. 1) Environmental Impact An Environment-friendly Solution: It is a safer technique of waste management that includes the decomposition of organic stuff into bio-stable compost. This procedure not only transforms waste but also decreases the impact of hazardous methane gas, a potent greenhouse gas released during the decomposition (anaerobic) of waste. This procedure also enriches the soil, enhances its structure, & promotes better growth of plants by returning precious nutrients to the earth. Environmental Alarms: Traditional techniques like incineration & landfilling, have a negative impact. Landfills are hazardous as they contribute to methane releases, water pollution, and the loss of nutrient-rich land. Incineration, while dropping the volume of waste, emits deadly pollutants into the atmosphere, resulting in health issues through air quality degradation. Both techniques also reduce the prospects of recycling organic waste into nutrient-packed compost, further depleting the soil value. 2) Social Impact Encouraging Environmental Education & Community Involvement: This unique process of composting also promotes environmental education & community involvement. Community programs bring folks together with a mutual aim of fostering sustainability. Besides, composting gives a hands-on learning experience, educating about the value of soil health, waste reduction, and a safe planet. Oldest Techniques of Waste Disposal: Old waste disposal approaches disconnect people from the waste they create. Once waste is gathered and sent to incinerators or landfills, it becomes “out of view, out of thought,” resulting in a lack of alertness about the social and environmental effects. This disconnect can deter efforts to endorse waste reduction in the community. 3) Economic Considerations Composting: Lucrative Waste Management: Composting can be a lucrative waste management solution, chiefly for companies and families that generate a noteworthy amount of organic waste. By composting one can easily reduce the necessity for expensive fertilizers & soil amendments, resulting in long-term savings. Moreover, composting can lower waste disposal expenses by reducing the quantity of waste sent to landfills. Old Waste Disposal: Financial Implications: Traditional waste disposal procedures come with ongoing expenses, including transportation expenses, landfill tipping charges, and environmental remediation expenses. As landfills reach volume, the charge of waste disposal is expected to increase, placing a financial burden on taxpayers and municipalities. Additionally, the failure to recover precious resources from organic waste denotes a missed economic prospect. Conclusion: When comparing composting to old waste disposal techniques, it becomes clear that composting delivers multiple social, economic, and environmental benefits. It not only controls the environmental effect of waste but also offers a great resource in the form of nutrient-packed compost. Composting also promotes environmental teaching, community involvement, and sustainable living practices. For those seeking to make a positive effect, composting is a great option. With Dostbin’s advanced composting solutions, you can effortlessly incorporate composting into your everyday routine, encouraging a greener planet and a healthier future.
